summary: Cab Calloway plays himself in a plot about jealousy, night clubs, and gangsters. Ends with a series of musical numbers.
cast: Cab Calloway|Ida James|Jeni Le Gon|William Campbell|Virginia Girvin|George Wiltshire|James Dunmore|Augustus Smith|Edgar Martin|Leonard Rogers|David Bethea|Shepard Roberts|Frederick Johnson|Dusty Fletcher|'Panama' Francis|Milt Hinton|Jonah Jones|Lois|The Miller Brothers|Peters Sisters|Dave Rivera|Sam 'The Man' Taylor
title: Hi De Ho
